/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Parked cars line the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight.

The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. It's as if you're sitting in the driver's seat, looking out at the city unfold before your eyes. The image beautifully encapsulates the vibrancy and dynamism of urban life in Beijing.
